FuncDef: This command enables system to send ICMPv6 PTB (Packet Too Big) message on private side and optionally specifies the rate.

ParaDef.Info: the maximum interval during which messages can be sent, in seconds. Values-1 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 10
the maximum number of ICMPv6 messages that can be sent during the configured interval. Values-10 to 1000. ParamDefault: Default- 100
